content:
CommandLineToolSwitchType Enum

Definition

Enumerates the types for command line switches.

In this Article

public enum CommandLineToolSwitchType
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
CommandLineToolSwitchType

Fields

Boolean

Indicates a Boolean type.
Integer

Indicates an integer type.
ITaskItemArray

Indicates a task item array type.
String

Indicates a string type.
StringArray

Indicates an array of strings type.
